about_the_game:
Card Buster is a fusion of action roguelike and deckbuilding genres, set in a vibrant post-apocalyptic world. You'll wield powerful cards, discover game-changing combos, and fight your way through Psychic’s maze to liberate Dusty Creek in real-time, action-packed battles.

Unleash Powerful Combos

Your creativity is your strongest weapon. Combine cards in unexpected ways to unleash devastating effects. Turn a simple Flamethrower into a swirling inferno of destruction by pairing it with the Hurricane card. Every weapon has multiple combos waiting to be discovered!

A World of Teenage Rebellion

As Buster, you'll lead a group of plucky teenagers in their quest to overthrow the evil mage Psychic. Craft magical cards from the mysterious Card Dust and build a resistance force to reclaim Dusty Creek!

Key Features

  • Real-time action meets deckbuilding: Battle enemies while crafting your perfect deck.

  • Many cards, infinite strategies: Unlock, loot, and craft new cards, experiment with countless combos, and upgrade your deck with every run.

  • Roguelike progression: Die, learn, and return stronger. Upgrade your cards and character between runs to face greater challenges.

  • Unique world & characters: A post-apocalyptic world filled with humor, danger, and a sense of adventure.

  • Stylized hand-drawn visuals: Distinct art style that brings the quirky world of Card Buster to life.

  • Post-launch content: New cards, new combos, and even more ways to play after release with free updates!

Dive into Card Buster and experience a unique blend of action, strategy, and roguelike progression. With its engaging combat, deckbuilding mechanics, and charming world, Card Buster offers a fresh take on multiple genres. Will you be the one to master the cards and save Dusty Creek? The fate of the town is in your hands!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or greater
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivelent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 550
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compitable Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivelent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 or Radeon R7 360 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compitable Sound Card

short_description: Get ready to bust through enemies with powerful card combos in this action-packed roguelike! Build your deck, master crazy synergies, and take on the evil mage Psychic to free Dusty Creek in this fast-paced, post-apocalyptic adventure!
